original_text: I have taken out my weapons from the place where I had stored them. I will use those weapons to punish the people of Babylonia, because I am very angry with them. 50: The weapons that the Lord uses are the nations that will attack Babylonia. I am the Lord God Almighty. I have work to do in the land of Babylonia. I have taken out my weapons from the place where I had stored them. I will use those weapons to punish the people of Babylonia, because I am very angry with them. 50: The weapons that the Lord uses are the nations that will attack Babylonia. I am the Lord God Almighty. I have work to do in the land of Babylonia. I have taken out my weapons from the place where I had stored them. I will use those weapons to punish the people of Babylonia, because I am very angry with them. 50: The weapons that the Lord uses are the nations that will attack Babylonia. I am the Lord God Almighty. I have work to do in the land of Babylonia. I have taken out my weapons from the place where I had stored them. I will use those weapons to punish the people of Babylonia, because I am very angry with them. 50: The weapons that the Lord uses are the nations that will attack Babylonia. I am the Lord God Almighty. I have work to do in the land of Babylonia. I have taken out my weapons from the place where I had stored them.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 병기창을 열고 분노의 무기를 꺼냄은 주 만군의 여호와께서 갈대아 사람의 땅에 행할 일이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: I have taken out my weapons
from the place where I had stored them
to punish the people of Babylonia
because I am very angry with them
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들에게 매우 화가 났기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: The weapons that the Lord uses
are the nations that will attack Babylonia
I am the Lord God Almighty
